Triggers any button of a given ID.
If the button ID does not exist, sends an extension trigger instead.

You can right click on a button to retrieve its button ID.
Box Name Type Description
Button ID Any ID of a button you want to activate.
Queue-Able boolean If set to true and the button is already activated, it will wait for it to finish and trigger the button again. Will get queued as many times as you execute the command.
If set to false and the button is already activated, nothing will happen.
Hidden Delay Int This exists to make a button happen without greying it out in case the button is showing valuable info.
The delay is hidden and cannot be cancelled (unless you use Reset or press Done in your Receiver).

Timers (Auto trigger button)

Import JSON button
